events.name: SupplierAdded
events.description: Captures the event of adding a new supplier to the traceability system.

events.name: SupplierUpdated
events.description: Tracks changes made to an existing supplier's details.

events.name: BatchQualityChecked
events.description: Records the quality check event of a batch in the system.

events.name: ProductRecalled
events.description: Handles the recall of a product due to safety concerns.

events.name: TraceabilityReportGenerated
events.description: Initiates the generation of traceability reports for batches.

commands.name: AddSupplier
commands.description: Captures the event of adding a new supplier to the traceability system.

commands.name: UpdateSupplier
commands.description: Tracks changes made to an existing supplier's details.

commands.name: CheckBatchQuality
commands.description: Records the quality check event of a batch in the system.

commands.name: RecallProduct
commands.description: Handles the recall of a product due to safety concerns.

commands.name: GenerateReport
commands.description: Initiates the generation of traceability reports for batches.

integrationPoints.name: SupplierManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with an external supplier management system to align supplier data.

integrationPoints.name: QualityAssurance
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with a quality assurance system for seamless quality checks.

integrationPoints.name: ReportingSystem
integrationPoints.description: Connect to a reporting system for automated report generation.
